verses.1: Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian hun dinga a seh sa hunin a piansak ahi hi.
verses.2: Suah hun om a, sih hun om hi. Suan hun om a, bawhkhiat hun om hi.
verses.3: Gawh hun om a, khoi hun om hi. Phel hun om a, lam hun om hi.
verses.4: Kah hun om a, nuih hun om hi. Dah hun om a, laam hun om hi.
verses.5: Lup khawm hun om a, tuam lup hun om hi. Kikawi hun om a, kikhah hun om hi.
verses.6: Zonʼ hun om a, mansuah hun om hi. Kep hun om a, paihkhiat hun om hi.
verses.7: Bal kek hun om a, phop hun om hi. Daih hun om a, pau hun om hi.
verses.8: It hun om a, muhdah hun om hi. Kido hun om a, kilem hun om hi.
verses.9: Na a sem mipa in a sep sa khempeuh thamanin bang ngah ahi hiam?
verses.10: Pasian in eiteʼ manlah pih dingin hong piak nasep ka thei hi.
verses.11: Amah in na khempeuh amauʼ hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing a theih zawh nading hong guan lo hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a nuntak lai teng a siam tawpun gamta-in lungdamin a om ding a thupi pen ahihna ka phawk hi.
verses.13: Eite khempeuh in an ne tui dawnin i sepna thaman tawh lungdamin i om ding kilawm a, tua pen Pasianʼ hong piak letsong ahi hi.
verses.14: Pasianʼ sep khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahihna ka thei hi. I behlap theih ding om lo a, i paihkhiat ding zong om lo hi. Amah i zahtak theih nadingin Pasian in tua bang ding mahin a bawl ahi hi.
verses.15: A piang khat peuhpeuh pen a piang ngeisa mah na hi a, a piang lai ding khat peuhpeuh zong a piang ngeisa mah na hi lel hi. Pasian in ama hunhunin a piang ngeisa mah piangsakkik zelzel hi.
verses.16: Tua tham loin, hih leitungah gitlohna in thuman thutang a suan khiatna zong ka mu hi.
verses.17: Pasian in sepna bawlna le na khempeuh ama hun ding sehkhol khin ahih manin, midikte le migilote thu khen ding hi.
verses.18: Mihingte pen ganhing bang lel ahihna uh a lahtel nadingin Pasian in mihingte ze-et hi, ci-in ka lungsimah ka ngaihsun hi.
verses.19: A tawpna ah ci lehang, mihingte le ganhingte in a tuah ding uh kibang a, ganhing mah bangin mihing zong a si ahi hi. Mihing le ganhing in a kibangin nuntakna hu nei a, mihing le ganhing nuntakna a kimanna bangmah om lo ahih manin, mihing pen ganhing sangin a hoihzawkna bangmah om tuan lo hi.
verses.20: A nih tuakun mun khat ah tung khawm ding uh a, leivui panin a piang uh ahih mah bangin leivui mah suakkik ding uh hi.
verses.21: Mihingteʼ kha vanah kah to-in ganhingteʼ kha lei ah lut suk hi, cih a thei zong kuamah om lo hi.
verses.22: Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a sep thaman uh ne-in nuamsa-in a om ding uh a hoih pen ahihna ka phawk hi. Tua lo a hih theih ding uh bangmah dang om lo hi. I sih khit ciangin bang piang ding cih theihtheihna bangmah om lo hi.
